page.title: 01Our Domesday Area
page.content:
The area which we have been studying lies to the west of the town of {Ballyclare}and north of the village of {Doagh.}It is mainly{agricultural land with a scattering of farms, churches and rivers. Most of these items are described in the pages which follow.
The principal {village }in the area is Burnside. At Kilbride there are two churches...the Parish Church and the Presbyterian Church. The graveyard at the Presbyterian Church is very old and has many interesting headstones.
There are two main factories in our area...Doagh Spinning Mill and Gowdy Engineering Works.
